scripts.start: cross-env GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false REACT_APP_DMSS_URL=http://localhost:5000 ESLINT_NO_DEV_ERRORS='true' REACT_APP_DM_JOB_URL=http://localhost:5001 craco start
scripts.build-all-packages: for package in ../packages/*/; do echo $package && cd $package && yarn install --no-lockfile && yarn build && rm -rf ./node_modules && cd ../../example; done
scripts.symlinks: for package in ../packages/*/; do echo $package && cd $package && mkdir -p dist && cd dist && ln -sf ../src/index.tsx index.js && cd ../../../example; done
scripts.remove-symlinks: for package in ../packages/*/; do echo $package && rm -rf dist && cd ../example; done
